level_1.name: Ammo Drop
level_1.description: Reloads allied weapons and keeps them full for a short time

level_1.name: Consecrated Arms
level_1.description: Grants a +1 bonus to weapon hit and damage for the party while Light Focus is held

level_1.name: Field Report
level_1.description: Opens a brief telepathic speech link to a willing target while Deep Focus is held

level_1.name: Force Shelter
level_1.description: Conjures a metadimensional tent shelter that also conceals those inside it

level_1.name: Meta-rations
level_1.description: Feeds and waters allies for a day per caster level, but can't be kept up constantly

level_1.name: Ruck Platform
level_1.description: Summons a floating platform to bear heavy loads or downed allies

level_1.name: This Is My Rifle
level_1.description: Calls a personal weapon owned by the caster to hand from any intra-solar distance

level_2.name: Commando Invocation
level_2.description: Hides the caster and allies from some TL4 sensors and grants night vision

level_2.name: Fighting Withdrawal
level_2.description: Short-range group teleport that goes off at the end of the round

level_2.name: Firing Position
level_2.description: Conjures metadimensional barrier that serves as a wall or a covered firing position

level_2.name: Ghost Soldiers
level_2.description: Create illusions of the caster and allies that remain as long as Light Focus is held

level_2.name: Roof Instantiation
level_2.description: Call up an overhead screen that moves with the caster and screens from aerial view

level_2.name: Rookie Courage
level_2.description: Imbue allies with tremendous courage and +2 to hit, at a cost of -2 to AC

level_2.name: Salvage Gear
level_2.description: Repair a vehicle, object, or other piece of gear so long as Light Focus is held

level_2.name: Stifle Explosion
level_2.description: Instantly squelch a grenade, explosion, artillery blast, or other concussive detonation

level_3.name: Artillery Strike
level_3.description: Invoke a 1d8/level metadimensional blast, but it goes off at the next round's end

level_3.name: Breaching Charge
level_3.description: Disintegrate a section of wall or other structure on an instant or delayed timer

level_3.name: Double Tap
level_3.description: Doubles a chosen ally's attack speed while Light Focus is held, costing System Strain

level_3.name: High Road Invocation
level_3.description: Grant the caster and two allies per level a limited flight at 10m per Main Action

level_3.name: Tank Kill
level_3.description: Touch a vehicle to instantly disable it for a short period, forcing open any hatches

level_3.name: Team Liaison
level_3.description: Grant an ally the ability to speak with anyone and read, but not write, anything

level_3.name: Terror of Battle
level_3.description: Causes all targets in a small burst area to suffer a Morale check

level_3.name: Walking Wounded
level_3.description: Stabilize and get mobile all downed targets in a 10-meter zone, but they remain fragile

level_4.name: Entrenchment Kinesis
level_4.description: Move earth and soil to create structures such as berms and trenches

level_4.name: Forced March
level_4.description: Make the caster and 2 allies/level tireless for one day per level, with 1 HP/hour healing

level_4.name: Metadimensional Minefield
level_4.description: Conjures an invisible minefield in an area; moving into it risks 4d6 mine explosions

level_4.name: Radio Intercept Protocol
level_4.description: Detect and overhear all nearby pertinent comm messages, even encrypted ones

level_4.name: War Gas Cloud
level_4.description: Creates a toxic gas cloud that does 2 HP/caster level in damage to susceptible targets

level_5.name: Air Cover
level_5.description: Creates mobile overhead shield that deflects aerial attacks and TL4 sensors

level_5.name: Forlorn Hope's Charge
level_5.description: Very brief, impervious group force field that also prevents attacks from the subjects

level_5.name: Infectious Despair
level_5.description: Instantly triggers a group Morale check at -3 when an ally kills or defeats one of them

level_5.name: Murphy's Law
level_5.description: Cause a visible vehicle or equipment piece to malfunction or disintegrate

level_5.name: Summon Fire Support
level_5.description: Conjures a fixed gun emplacement that can be manned to provide fire support

level_5.name: Ten Thousand Bullets
level_5.description: Invoke 1d10 dmg/level rain of death on target, but with dire effects if interrupted
